definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: Bureaucratic organizations strain the use of rules, regulations, procedures, policies and hierarchal authority.
sentences.chinese: 官僚机构劳损了规则，规定，程序，政策和层次权威。

sentences.english: It’s called RSI or Repetitive Strain Injury.
sentences.chinese: 它被称为RSI，或者肢体重复性劳损。

sentences.english: Does not have outside the model the wound waist chronic muscle damage, is called the waist strain.
sentences.chinese: 无典型外伤口的腰部慢性筋肉损伤，称为腰部劳损。

sentences.english: This increases strain on the knee.
sentences.chinese: 这增加了膝关节的劳损。

sentences.english: How did you change your working habits to avoid getting RSI again?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何通过改变工作习惯避免肢体重复性劳损的？

sentences.english: Something so simple as proper chair height can prevent injuries.
sentences.chinese: 简简单单调整一下椅子的高低就可以避免劳损。

sentences.english: Enough of diagnosing lumbar muscle strain lumbar disc herniation and pathological changes.
sentences.chinese: 解晰腰肌劳损及腰椎间盘突出的病因诊断及病理改变。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of the therapy with filiform needlings and heat needlings on chronic lumbar muscle strain.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察毫针火针治疗慢性腰肌劳损的临床疗效。

sentences.english: The pectoral girdle is excessively tight or too thin possibly causes shoulders the strain.
sentences.chinese: 肩带过紧或太细都可能引起肩背劳损。

sentences.english: The most commonly known RSI is carpal tunnel syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 最为人熟知的肢体重复性劳损症是腕管综合症。

sentences.english: Does remedial strain of lumbar muscles have specific?
sentences.chinese: 治疗腰肌劳损有没有特效药？

sentences.english: But repetitive strain injuries are perhaps most infamously associated with computer use.
sentences.chinese: 但重复性劳损的最令人诟病的原因是使用计算机。
肢体重复性劳损症不会威胁生命。

sentences.english: RSI also affects your quality of life.
sentences.chinese: 肢体重复性劳损症还会影响你的生命的质量。

sentences.english: Avoiding RSI in the first place is quite simple. Here are a few tips
sentences.chinese: 在第一时间就避免得肢体重复性劳损症是很简单的。

definition: cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals

yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1 zheng4

definition: to have a stiff neck after sleeping/(of the head) to touch the pillow
